attributes.action: Reinstate rush hour trains from London Bridge to Brighton and Hove
attributes.background: Southern have stopped all services from London Bridge to Brighton and Hove between 5-7pm (rush hour) - on NON strike days. So we are paying thousands of pounds for tickets for a service that is not even running. This has to stop and the government has to intervene!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The scheduling of train times is the responsibility of train operating companies.
